alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN WARREN AND WESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Blanchester, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Wilmington, Blanchester, New Vienna, Morrow, South Lebanon, Woodville, Maineville, Clarksville, Harveysburg, Martinsville, Midland, Butlerville, Pleasant Plain, State Route 123 at State Route 132, Fort Ancient, Oakland, Morrisville, Ogden and Kingman. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 28 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
